overview: Ever wished you cold take all your favorite all-girl scenes from your collection (or your best friend's) and put then in one film, on one disc?!? Well, wish no more as Viv Thomas kindly presents: The Platinum Collection - Girl on Girl. Here are five of the best, carefully chosen from the vast VivThomas.com archives to represent the different flavours and variety of lesbian love & lust.
title: Girl on Girl
